channel.title: Abouts on CYBERALIENX
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on CYBERALIENX

item.description:
Profile

Hi, I’m Shaine Muswere, a Cyber Security Analyst based in Rondebosch, Western Cape, South Africa. I view myself as an innovator and an artist. I believe in the quote by the late Steve Jobs: “Technology alone is not enoughâ€”it’s technology married with liberal arts, married with the humanities, that yields us the results that make our heart sing.”

I am a SOC Level 2 Cyber Security Analyst with experience in threat hunting, automation, and Python development. I am committed to continuous learning and professional development, holding certifications such as CompTIA CySA+, CompTIA Security+, and others.
